channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Team Foundation Server 2018
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Team Foundation Server 2018

item.title: CVE-2019-0777|2024-08-04T17:58:57.282Z -- microsoft -- team%20foundation%20server%202018
item.description: A Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists when Team Foundation Server does not properly sanitize user provided input, aka 'Team Foundation Server Cross-site Scripting Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2019-1076|2024-08-04T18:06:31.661Z -- microsoft -- team%20foundation%20server%202018
item.description: A Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists when Team Foundation Server does not properly sanitize user provided input, aka 'Team Foundation Server Cross-site Scripting Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2019-0867|2024-08-04T17:58:59.547Z -- microsoft -- team%20foundation%20server%202018
item.description: A Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists when Azure DevOps Server and Team Foundation Server do not properly sanitize user provided input, aka 'Azure DevOps Server and Team Foundation Server Cross-site Scripting Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2019-0866, CVE-2019-0868, CVE-2019-0870, CVE-2019-0871.

item.title: CVE-2020-0758|2024-08-04T06:11:05.566Z -- microsoft -- team%20foundation%20server%202018
item.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists when Azure DevOps Server and Team Foundation Services improperly handle pipeline job tokens, aka 'Azure DevOps Server and Team Foundation Services Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2020-0815.

item.title: CVE-2019-0971|2024-08-04T18:06:29.961Z -- microsoft -- team%20foundation%20server%202018
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists when Azure DevOps Server and Microsoft Team Foundation Server do not properly sanitize a specially crafted authentication request to an affected server, aka 'Azure DevOps Server and Team Foundation Server Information Disclosure Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2019-1306|2024-08-04T18:13:30.435Z -- microsoft -- team%20foundation%20server%202018
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Azure DevOps Server (ADO) and Team Foundation Server (TFS) fail to validate input properly, aka 'Azure DevOps and Team Foundation Server Remote Code Execution Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2019-0742|2024-08-04T17:58:57.307Z -- microsoft -- team%20foundation%20server%202018
item.description: A Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists when Team Foundation Server does not properly sanitize user provided input, aka 'Team Foundation Server Cross-site Scripting Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2019-0743.

item.title: CVE-2019-0743|2024-08-04T17:58:58.064Z -- microsoft -- team%20foundation%20server%202018
item.description: A Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists when Team Foundation Server does not properly sanitize user provided input, aka 'Team Foundation Server Cross-site Scripting Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2019-0742.
